Introductions

  • Mike Kelly (@mikerkelly)

Workshop Objectives

  • React Vocabulary and Concepts
  • Flux Components and Flow
  • Familiarity with Modern JS Tools

Topics

  • Project Setup and Build Tools
  • React Basics
  • Flux
  • Routing
  • Forms and Validation
  • Custom Components

Format

  • Lecture
  • Individual Labs
  • Review
  • Repeat

The Lab

Timesheetz

We will build a fully-functioning React/Flux application together.

It is an application for tracking and updating timesheets. Woot Woot.

Teammates

  • Designers: Will provide styles and page designs.
  • Server Team: Provide a REST Api and NodeJs application server.
  • Product Owners: Provide us with requirements along the way.
  • Front End Team: This is all of us and we are awesome!
